post.body: i got my two for my netflix thank you .

I tend to like some of the older ones best....but here are a few: SORRY, WRONG NUMBER JOSHUA DEAD RINGERS 6TH SENSE FRACTURE CACHE OLD BOY HARD CANDY CAPE FEAR There have been some good answers listed. I may go back a see some myself.

I think you be the first person eva said he wanted something to make him think. I ain't neva had nobody that had to be made to think, they usually just thunk on they own. I kinda like that you need some motivating factors to get ya thinking, gives me more time to stick ya in the box - and you can do plenty a thinking in there. Why don't you mosey on ever and see what the last girl was thinking when we put her in the box. I got that on film so we could all remember the good ol' days. I reckon you can find it somewhere in the list.
OLD BOY is amazing. How about SYMPATHY FOR MR. VENGENCE and LADY VENGENCE, the other two movies in Park Chanwook's vengence trilogy.
